snippet: The holiday may not mark a seasonal shift (just look at the temperature), but we can still pause, look and consider the small changes.
abstract: Editorial holds it is impossible not to feel the changing of the seasons around Labor Day; suggests Labor Day has nothing to do with rhythms of nature, but offers an opportunity to stand back and consider the ebb and flow of the world.
lead_paragraph: The holiday may not mark a seasonal shift (just look at the temperature), but we can still pause, look and consider the small changes.
